display_long_description:
# X-Slap: Defend Your Candy with Your Bare Hands!

Monsters are invading your home, and they're after your candy stash! **X-Slap** transforms your living room into an arcade battleground where your hands become the ultimate weapons.

**Pure Gesture-Powered Action**

Slap balls at monster invaders! Punch red orbs to unleash explosive bomb clusters, and point-and-poke yellow orbs to shoot devastating finger lasers. The hand tracking makes every gesture feel natural and satisfying, though you can also play with controllers.

**Endlessly Replayable**

With **30 unique power-ups** and procedurally generated waves, no two sessions are identical. You'll experience heart-pounding moments where you're one hit from defeat, then a clutch power-up drops and turns everything around. That's the magic of **X-Slap** – skill meets luck meets pure arcade fun.

**Instant Fun, Deep Strategy**

Pick up and play in seconds, but discover endless depth. Casual players enjoy quick 10-minute sessions while hardcore gamers chase perfect runs and high scores. Every wave forces new tactical decisions as you adapt to random enemy patterns and power-up combinations.

**Early Access - Free!**

Our Meta Start Competition entry is now available for everyone! **X-Slap** proves mixed reality gaming should enhance your space, not replace it.

**Download now and start slapping!**

*Compatible with Quest 3/3S/Pro | Hand tracking optional*
